comments:
Create a dataset using either the sample db or a jdbc database.
Preview in 'Edit Data Set' dialog shows expected DB query results. Select 'ok'.
Immediately thereafter, in 'Data Explorer', double click on newly created data set.

'Assertion Failed' dialog appears.
Plug-in Provider: Eclipse.org

Version:2.0.0
Error Code:Error.GUIException.invokedByUnexpectedException
